titleStmt.title: A treatyse declarynge the despyte of a secrete sedycyous person that dareth not shewe hym selfe
titleStmt.author: Smyth, Thomas, servaunt to the Quenes most excellent Majestie.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprynted at Londo[n] in Pater noster rowe, at y[e] signe of our lady pytye by Iohn Redman,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries.

place.placeName: Londo[n] in Pater noster rowe, at y[e] signe of our lady pytye
